<letter id="smd7808">
<recipient first="" last="" type="individual"/>
</p><p>
<a rel="month origin" value="5">May</a> <a rel='day origin' value='5'>5th</a>. [<a href='/results.php?year=1862' rel="origin">1862</a>] [<a href='/results.php?city=baton rouge' rel='city origin'>Baton Rouge</a>, Louisiana]
</p><p>
Vile old Yankee boats, four in number, passed up this morning without stopping. After all our excitement, this "silent contempt" annihilated me! What 
in the world do they mean? The river was covered with burning cotton; perhaps they want to see where it came from. 
</p><p>
</letter>
